name: Rad Rabbit
description:
RAD RABBIT

The endless rabbit runner, see how many carrots and how far you can get.

A simple endless runner game, bumping into things will slow you down and eventually you'll get caught by the sinister gloved hand. You can kick robots out of the way and they'll blow them up into tiny pieces. Or jump over obstacles to avoid them.

Collecting strawberries will give you a temporary speed boost.

Collect carrots to spend later in the store to buy items to customize your rabbit.

Fully free from microtransactions which will not be added a later date.

Please comment any feedback you have, we'd love to hear it and it'll help us to further update and improve this game.

If you like the artwork, please check out my amazing artist's Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/paper.skirted.ballerina/
.
